Midl.description: List of IDL files to preprocess using an IDL compiler

IncludeDirectories.description: Paths to search for included headers or imported IDL files

PreprocessorDefinitions.description: Preprocessor macros to define when compiling this IDL file

GenerateHeader.description: Whether or not to generate a header file and include it in the compilation automatically

HeaderFilePath.description: The full path to the header file output by the IDL compiler. Leave blank if undesired.

GenerateTypeLibrary.description: Whether or not to generate a TLB file

TypeLibraryFilePath.description: The full path to the TLB output by the IDL compiler. Leave blank if undesired.

OutputFiles.description: Files that are output by compilation of this IDL file. Used for incremental builds.

EnableDefaultMidlItems.description: Whether or not to automatically compile all *.idl files detected under the project directory

DefaultMidlIncludeDirectories.description: Paths to search for included headers or imported IDL files when compiling any IDL file in this project

DefaultMidlPreprocesorDefinitions.description: Preprocessor macros to define when compiling any IDL file in this project
